spec.expr:
_stream: {log.syslog.appname=fortigate,fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,log.syslog.hostname in ($firewall),fgt.vd in ($vdom),network.direction in (${direction:doublequote})}
AND fgt.action:($action) AND $Logsql AND $crscore
AND file.name:*
| stats by (file.name,fgt.action) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream: {log.syslog.appname=fortigate,fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,log.syslog.hostname in ($firewall),fgt.vd in ($vdom),network.direction in (${direction:doublequote})}
AND fgt.action:($action) AND $Logsql AND $crscore
AND fgt.virus:*
| stats by (fgt.virus,fgt.action) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream: {log.syslog.appname=fortigate,fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,log.syslog.hostname in ($firewall),fgt.vd in ($vdom),network.direction in (${direction:doublequote})}
AND fgt.action:($action) AND $Logsql AND $crscore
AND fgt.viruscat:*
| stats by (fgt.viruscat,fgt.action) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream: {log.syslog.appname=fortigate,fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,log.syslog.hostname in ($firewall),fgt.vd in ($vdom),network.direction in (${direction:doublequote})}

AND fgt.action:($action) AND $Logsql AND $crscore

_stream: {log.syslog.appname=fortigate,fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,log.syslog.hostname in ($firewall),fgt.vd in ($vdom),network.direction in (${direction:doublequote})}

_stream: {log.syslog.appname=fortigate,fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,log.syslog.hostname in ($firewall),fgt.vd in ($vdom),network.direction in (${direction:doublequote})}

AND fgt.action:($action) AND $Logsql AND $crscore

AND fgt.action:($action) AND $Logsql AND $crscore
| stats by (url.domain,fgt.action) count(url.domain) results

AND fgt.action:($action) AND $Logsql AND $crscore

| sort by (results) desc

_stream:{log.syslog.appname=fortigate,fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,log.syslog.hostname in ($firewall),fgt.vd in ($vdom),network.direction in (${direction:doublequote})}

AND fgt.action:($action) AND $Logsql AND $crscore
AND NOT fgt.srccountry:Reserved

_stream:{log.syslog.appname=fortigate,fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,log.syslog.hostname in ($firewall),fgt.vd in ($vdom),network.direction in (${direction:doublequote})}

| sort by (results) desc

_stream:{log.syslog.appname=fortigate,fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,log.syslog.hostname in ($firewall),fgt.vd in ($vdom),network.direction in (${direction:doublequote})}

AND fgt.action:($action) AND $Logsql AND $crscore

_stream:{log.syslog.appname=fortigate,fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,log.syslog.hostname in ($firewall),fgt.vd in ($vdom),network.direction in (${direction:doublequote})}

_stream:{log.syslog.appname=fortigate,log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote}),fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,network.direction in (${direction:doublequote})} 
AND fgt.action:($action) AND $Logsql AND $crscore
| stats by (network.application,fgt.action) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{log.syslog.appname=fortigate,log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote}),fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,network.direction in (${direction:doublequote})}

| stats by (fgt.service,fgt.action) count() results

_stream:{log.syslog.appname=fortigate,log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote}),fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,network.direction in (${direction:doublequote})}

| stats by (fgt.appcat,fgt.action) count() results

_stream:{log.syslog.appname=fortigate,log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote}),fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,network.direction in (${direction:doublequote})} 
AND fgt.action:($action) AND $Logsql AND $crscore
AND fgt.apprisk:*
| stats by (fgt.apprisk,fgt.action) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

spec.description:
Custom LogsQL filter attached to every query.
Set to "*" to not filter.
See https://docs.victoriametrics.com/victorialogs/logsql/
spec.name: Logsql
